body:
I stumbled on this issue that xfsprogs currently does not install with error message:

```
FATAL ERROR: could not find a valid ini.h header.
```
:warning: :warning: :warning: 

(The warnings I added for greater effect :laughing: 

Anyway, adding this package libinih, and including it as a dependency for xfsprogs seems to fix the issue. 

## For Discussion

- It looks like libinih doesn't have .tar.gz releases so I only added the master branch (it failed to install from the archive url that is under releases) so we might need to discuss that.
- It could be that we only need to add it for newer versions (if it worked before) and maybe a maintainer can comment on that.

Signed-off-by: vsoch <vsoch@users.noreply.github.com>
title: package: bug with xfsprogs missing ini.h
